name: Lunie ðŸ˜¸
greetingText: This is a message to my cutie patootie wife, my lovely girlfriend, my dearest lover...
wishText: To the most lovely woman in the world, the one I adore everyday and am obsessed with, the one I am super thankful for and makes me feel safe. The one that makes me laugh, smile, and has my heart. I miss you so much everyday and don't know what I'd do without you. You're my everything and I wouldn't want it any other way
